page.title: 18POPULATION - TYSOE - 1985
page.content: Numbers in/of % Total Population 789 Adults 462 58.6 Retired People 154 19.5 Children 173 21.9 Total Homes 351 Single Person Homes 86 24.5 Homes Retired People only 107 30.0 Homes 1 Retired Person 62 17.7 Homes Indigenous People 120 34.0 Homes keeping Dogs 109 31.0 Total Dogs kept 144+ Total Vehicles 342 Homes with 1 vehicle 173 50.0 Homes/more than 1 vehicle 88 25.0 Homes with no vehicle 90 25.0 A third of all the families have lived in the village for over 30 years. Of the homes which are occupied by one retired person, 85% have no vehicle, and 23% have a dog.
